EmailTemplate.name: SiteUserTemplate
EmailTemplate.subject: Matchy Profile Creation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Profile__c.Name},
Greetings!
We hope you are doing well. Thanks for Choosing Matchy. We are bounded to provide the best services to our customers.
Here is one request from us, Please fill out the form by clicking the link given below {!Profile__c.ProfileURL__c}. This will help us to provide the best service to you.
Thanks & Regards Matchy The Matchmaker App
